welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ludwigshafen, a charming city situated on the Rhine River known for its rich industrial history and beautiful waterfront. We invite you to explore and enjoy the city's unique mix of culture, history, and natural beauty during your stay.

restaurants.name: Maffenbeier
restaurants.description: Maffenbeier is a german restaurant located in Ludwigshafen am Rhein.

restaurants.name: BASF Gesellschaftshaus

restaurants.name: Mémoires d'Indochine
restaurants.description: Mémoires d'Indochine is a vietnamese restaurant located in Mannheim.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heidelberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heidelberg Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.
